description: Discover seamless website management. Unlock powerful tools for hosting, building, optimizing, and securing your site. Elevate your web presence with 10Web.
title: Elevate Your Business with 10Web | Build Your Website with AI
introduction: 10Web is the first AI-Powered WordPress Platform offering powerful features like AI-assisted website building, automatic 90+ PageSpeed score, user and team management, 1-click migration, multiple website management, real-time backups, and top-notch security. It also provides an AI Website Builder that recreates website designs without coding, and an AI Assistant for content creation and SEO optimization.
targetPeople: Businesses and individuals looking to create or manage websites

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: You will have a one week free trial to build and explore your AI generated website.

faqs.question: How much does 10Web AI Website Builder cost?
faqs.answer: The cost depends on the plan chosen, with different pricing plans available to suit different users.

faqs.question: Does the AI Website Builder offer templates?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers pre-made pages as starting points for adding new pages to your AI generated website.

faqs.question: Can I add custom design elements to my website?
faqs.answer: Yes, premium widgets and customization options are available for adding custom design elements.

faqs.question: Does 10Web offer hosting services?
faqs.answer: Yes, hosting services are provided so users don't need to find a separate hosting provider.
